title: DirectorAnimationConfig
description: An instance of a director animation.

delay.title: Delay
delay.description: Is there a timer to wait for start ? If yes, specify a time in ms.

smooth.title: Smooth
smooth.description: Does the animation have a smooth start from the actual point the camera is looking at.

stoppable.title: Stoppable
stoppable.description: Can the user stop the animation ?

idleTime.title: Idle time
idleTime.description: Is there a time to wait for start after user interaction ? If yes, specify a time in ms. If the time is negative, it is considered that the animation never resume.

tracks.title: Tracks
tracks.description: The list of tracks UID ot execute. The tracks are executed in the order they are written in this array.
